source: # In case there are Leavers not yet in hr_employee_dim

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW employee_dim_from_leavers

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    Pers_No,
    Last_name,
    First_name,
    CoCd,  -- record
    Company_Code,  -- record
    Loc,  -- record
    Location,  -- record
    PS_group,  -- record
    Pay_Band_Description,  -- record
    Org_unit,  -- record
    Organizational_Unit,  -- record
    PA,  -- record
    Personnel_Area,  -- record
    Personnel_Subarea,  -- record
    WorkC,
    Work_Contract,
    to_timestamp(Org_Start_Date) AS Org_Start_Date, --- _dim
    Leaving,
    Act,
    Action_Type,
    ActR,
    Reason_for_Action,
    S,
    Employment_Status,
    Employee_No,
    Position,
    Position_1,
    Annual_salary,
    Curr,
    User_ID,
    Email_Address,
    Pers_No_1,
    Name_of_Manager_OM,
    Manager_Position,
    MAnager_Position_Text,
    LM_E_mail,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers_temp
WHERE Pers_No NOT IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim) AND RN = 1;
## Load new lines for leavers not in hr_employee_dim

%%sql

INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim 


SELECT DISTINCT
    Row_Number() over (order by T1.Pers_No NULLS FIRST)     AS EmployeeInfoID,
    T1.Pers_No                                              AS EmployeeID,
    T1.First_name                                           AS FirstName,
    T1.Last_name                                            AS LastName,
    'N/A'                                                   AS Gender,
    'N/A'                                                   AS AddressLine1,
    'N/A'                                                   AS AddressLine2,
    'N/A'                                                   AS AddressLine3,
    'N/A'                                                   AS City,
    'N/A'                                                   AS County,
    'N/A'                                                   AS PostCode,
    'N/A'                                                   AS EmailAddress,
    'N/A'                                                   AS TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    'N/A'                                                   AS TelephoneNumberWork,
    'N/A'                                                   AS FTE,
    'N/A'                                                   AS WorkHours,
    'N/A'                                                   AS PartTimeEmployee,
    'Leaver'                                                AS EmploymentStatus,
    to_timestamp(T1.Org_Start_Date)                         AS CivilServiceStart,
    NULL                                                    AS DateToCurrentJob,
    NULL                                                    AS SeniorityDate,
    to_timestamp(T1.Org_Start_Date)                         AS OrgStartDate,
    NULL                                                    AS FixTermEndDate,
    NULL                                                    AS LoanStartDate,
    NULL                                                    AS LoanEndDate,
    'N/A'                                                   AS AssignmentNumber,
    T1.annual_salary                                        AS AnnualSalary, 
    T1.curr                                                 AS Currency,
    T1.Reason_For_Action                                    AS ReasonForAction,
    NULL                                                    AS DateToSubstantiveGrade, 
    T4.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)                          AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                    AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.Pers_No,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.First_name,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Last_name,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.Employment_Status,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Org_Start_Date, '.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.annual_salary,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.curr,'.')
            )
        )                                               AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                                     AS IsActive

FROM employee_dim_from_leavers T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "SAP HR" = T4.Description
